ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 134
ygData.msgSnippet: It makes it less resistable... I wish they would make it straight dd...
ygData.messageBody:
It makes it less resistable... I wish they would make it straight dd...


>From: "David Kaplan" <dkaplan@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 134
>Date: Wed, 15 Sep 1999 03:00:08 -0700
>
>From: "David Kaplan" <dkaplan@...>
>
>I would have to say that the new patch has made me adjust the style that I
>use when fighting mobs. Now that I have adopted the root and dot, dot, dot,
>and sometimes dot technique, I realize that I could have easily done it
>that
>way before. Now the patch helps even more by giving me extra damage when
>the
>mob is rooted. I would have to say that the mob gets to me a lot easier
>with
>this technique, but manageable with good tactics.
>
>My one BIG rant is what they have done to the Darkness line of spells
>because of the patch. The whole spell line is rendered useless for damage
>now because root wipes it out. They really need to figure out a way to make
>darkness stick even when a root is cast on the mob.
>
>Ok, one more rant to finish it off, what they have done to ignite bones is
>ridiculous. It is a horrible DD to begin with, now they remove the
>root-like
>effect and make it even worse, AARGH!
>
>Dresa D'Ashire
>41st Necromancer
>Rallos Zek
>
>
